cards.title: Initial Request
cards.description: This is the first card that appears. It has two arrows - one pointing right and one pointing down.

cards.title: Right Card
cards.description: This card appears when you click the right arrow on card 1. It has a down arrow.

cards.title: Bottom Card
cards.description: This card appears when you click the down arrow on card 1. It has arrows going left and right.

cards.title: Nested Bottom
cards.description: This card appears below card 1.1. It has no arrows (terminal card).

cards.title: Left Card
cards.description: This card appears to the left of card 2.

cards.title: Right Card
cards.description: This card appears to the right of card 2. It has down arrow.

cards.title: Final Card
cards.description: This is a final card with multiple arrows in all directions.
